mapper.insert:
insert into operation_log
id,
create_time,
level,
operation_unit,
method,
args,
user_id,
user_name,
description,
operation_type,
run_time,
return_value,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{operationUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{args,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{runTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{returnValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: SELECT id, create_time createTime, LEVEL, operation_unit operationUnit, method, args, user_id userId, user_name userName, description, operation_type operationType, run_time runTime, return_value returnValue FROM operation_log
